#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int sieve[1000001],primes[1000001],prime=0,bal[1000001];
int main(){
int i,n,k=0,t;
for(i=1;i<=1000000;i++)
sieve[i]=1;
for(i=4;i<=1000000;i+=2)
sieve[i]=0;
long long j;
for(i=3;i<=1000000;i+=2)
{
if(sieve[i])
for(j=(long long int)i*i;j<=1000000;j+=i)
sieve[j]=0;
}
for(i=2;i<=1000000;i++)
{
if(sieve[i])
primes[prime++]=i;
}
for(i=2;i<prime-1;i++)
{
if(((primes[i-1]+primes[i+1])/2)==primes[i])
bal[k++]=primes[i];
}
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
scanf("%d",&n);
printf("%d\n",bal[n-1]);
}
return 0;
}
